statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); git_branch=$(cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$git_branch" ]; then printf "\033[36m%s\033[0m \033[90m%s\033[0m \033[32m[%s]\033[0m" "$model" "$(basename "$cwd")" "$git_branch"; else printf "\033[36m%s\033[0m \033[90m%s\033[0m" "$model" "$(basename "$cwd")"; fi
